filterCriteria.sql: SELECT bin_number, Height, Radar_Reflectivity, CPR_Cloud_mask, test2d.* FROM test3d JOIN test2d ON test3d.Latitude = test2d.Latitude AND test3d.Longitude = test2d.Longitude AND test3d.UTC_start = test2d.UTC_start AND test3d.Profile_time = test2d.Profile_time WHERE Height != -9999 AND Height != 9999;
